analysis.Summary: Vue component rendering a card with an optional image, title and subtitle. Supports both display and inline editing modes.
analysis.Purpose: Provides a reusable UI element in a constructor/builder interface for displaying or editing a card (image + text).

Components.name: Card (this component)
Components.role: Wraps image and text sections, switches between edit and view modes.

Components.name: UploadImage
Components.role: Displays an image upload control bound to modelValue.photo when in edit mode.

Components.name: Field
Components.role: Renders text inputs for title and subtitle when in edit mode.

Functions.name: defineProps
Functions.purpose: Defines reactive props `modelValue` and `isEditing` for this component.

parameters.modelValue: Object with keys photo, title, subtitle

analysis.Usage:
Import and register the component where cards are required. Example:

import Card from 'modules/constructor/components/elements/Card.vue';
...
<Card v-model:modelValue="item" :isEditing="editingFlag"/>
Notes: No dedicated <style> block; styling relies on utility classes (e.g., w-100, pd-medium).
Two-way binding for photo, title and subtitle uses Vue 3 v-model modifiers.
Reactive `isEditing` is initialized from prop but not synced back automatically.
Default `modelValue` ensures the object always has photo, title, subtitle fields.
